intro: The special edition of farming simulator Farm Expert 2019, which succeeded on mobile platforms, is now on Nintendo Switch™.
description:
Farm Expert 2019 for Nintendo Switch™ includes over 20 unique agricultural machines and four open worlds, as well as over 50 hours of gameplay. Drive machines, manage resources and experience a broad selection of agricultural activities.

You can plough, fertilise, harvest grain, breed cows, grow fruit orchards and buy and sell resources.

Now playable in Tabletop Mode and TV Mode in addition to Handheld Mode.

• Over 20 agricultural machines
• Four game worlds (American, British, German, Spanish)
• Over 50 hours of gameplay
• Cow breeding, comprehensive field labour and fruit-growing
• A store to buy necessary materials and machines
• ...and much more!
